H0.text: Which insects live in a vespiary. Bee

H1.text: Which insects live in a vespiary. Ant

H2.text: Which insects live in a vespiary. Hornet

H3.text: Which insects live in a vespiary. Wasp

A5.text: All species of social wasps construct their nests using some form of plant fiber (mostly wood pulp) as the primary material

A6.text: Hornets build communal nests by chewing wood to make a papery pulp.

A7.text: Hornets are wasps of the genus Vespa in the subfamily Vespinae.
